website_summaries.verdict: The shine seems to last longer after you use this metal cleaning polish, which works on a wide variety of metals.
pros: Product works without a lot of elbow grease
Simply wipe on and wipe off before it dries
Protects metals for a long time
Product rinses easily and does not scratch your surfaces
cons: The lavender-smelling formula does not seem to work as well as a previous formulation of this product

customer_reviews.title: Lavender scent screwed up a good product
customer_reviews.text: If I wanted my metals to smell pretty, I'd put perfume on them. Maas screwed up by adding scent to their polish. They HAD an amazing product. Now the lavender scent separates from the polish and makes a sticky gooey mess. I have to squeeze out half the product just to get some good polish without scent smearing all over. I've tried to contact the company three times without response. If you can find it without scent, you should order some. With lavender scent, save your money.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not What It Once Was
customer_reviews.text: I used to love Maas for polishing my silver; but when they went to this lavender formula, they lost me. It separates and is runny and sticky and consequently does not do as good a job as before. I have quit it in favor of Wenol, which is kind of like what Maas used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Crawlinwithcats

customer_reviews.title: The best cleaner of metal surfaces for home and church
customer_reviews.text: I am part of a group that cleans the vessels used at church. We use maas in the canister and the polish in the tube. Purposely we chose this item over others. We have use a variety of products. Maas cleans, rinses well, does not scratch or harm surfaces of brass silver, candles, cups, bowls, patents etc. We have access to candle wax remover, brasso and other products. Some ladies use them, the majority 7 of the 10 reach for maas. It is a bit more pricy, but works well on all items.
customer_reviews.author: E. sl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing on silver!!
customer_reviews.text: I had another silver cleaner that I used on a silver wine cup that did absolutely nothing, this stuff made it look like it is brand new!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon addict

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a lot of sterling, to use and not just show. Maas is a superior polish that gives a longer-lasting shine than other products I have tried. A toothbrush works well on intricate castings and ornamentation, and a microfiber cloth easily removes the residue. The polish comes out in the wash so the microfiber is not stained. A perfect reason for Amazon's existence, as this polish disappeared from my Ace Hardware and Fred Meyer stores since I last bought it.
customer_reviews.author: MtSiView

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned silver and brass with this product. Easy to use, great results too. Some of the brass was very old & so dirty I wasn’t even sure it was actually brass. Had to apply a few times to get the shine I wanted, but would have been at least twice the work with the product I used in the past., and still would not haven’t gotten these results. The one I purchased has no scent. I’m told the lavender one has a light scent and works even better I’ll try that one next.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper 402

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL
customer_reviews.text: So, I had a box of silver plate that I had picked up from a garage sale. It was pretty tarnished. I had liquid solver polish that was useless so I ordered the Maas polish paste. It works really well as you can see from the pix. I used a dot about the size of a half pea on each piece. The only drawback is the tube is metal and the paste can be difficult to get out of the tube. I had to add a very small amount of elbow grease to shine these pieces up. Unscented.
customer_reviews.author: Karen kettering

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! When it says it polishes all metals, it means ALL metals. I polished pewter, brass, silver, copper, even gold. It works beautifully on all metals. No need to have a separate silver polish and brass polish anymore. Lasts forever because you only need a tiny bit. Great stuff! But, like any other metal polish, it smells terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Kunkel

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: This polish is awesome! I have a lot of silver jewelry and platinum. I always had to take my platinum jewelry to be sent off for buffing to restore its shine but not anymore! My 19 year old wedding and anniversary rings look brand new thanks to this polish. I’ve used it on all of my silver too and even on a steel ice cream scooper that had darkened over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn P

customer_reviews.title: Works really great for nickel plate.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Maas cleaning polish to shine the nickel playing on my vintage lantern collection, I must say I’m very impressed with the shine quality and ease of application of the polish, I’ve tried other products, but none of them are not even close what Maas can do for nickel objects.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Orn

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous!
customer_reviews.text: Love ....love this product on glass stovetop and white dishes/cleaning utensil marks. Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy on and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this polish for many years. I inherited some silver pitches, plates and other sterling and plate products. I have tried to use several other products but keep coming back to Maas for two reasons. It goes on easy but more important the shine lasts much longer.
customer_reviews.author: H Squared

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to keep my brass hardware shining. It is much better than Brasso or anything else I have tried. No odor, and is easy to use. Not sure it keeps everything as shiny for as long as it used to. Seems like I have to use it more often, maybe every 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: After buying a silver item at an auction, I tried repeatedly to clean it with multiple things. Then I finally remembered my mom had introduced me to Maas Metal Polish many years ago. I immediately ordered it and received it the next day. It still works perfectly! I LOVE this stuff! Wipe on, wipe off....quick, easy, and most importantly...EFFECTIVE!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Metal Polisher
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of polishing silver, and Amazon has the best price. The only drawback is it takes a lot of pressure rubbing to get the job done. But it's worth it when the lustre is totally natural and original looking.
customer_reviews.author: wcf

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This product was super easy to use and did an amazing job! Silver polished the easiest and I also used it on copper mugs and a brass jewelry piece. It made everything look brand new! I can literally now see my reflection in the silver tea tray I found at a thrift store. Only downside is it did ruined the towels I used, so just used cloth you won't miss. Super worth it though!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: If really dirty will need something stronger
customer_reviews.text: I used it to clean my Kirby vacuum i just bought from someone it does work but i had to to it a lot if it's really dirty will need something stronger i cleaned the middle over 40 time's and still needs more
customer_reviews.author: Tara wingate

customer_reviews.title: I recommend. The bathroom porcelain vanity had a rust stain
customer_reviews.text: A dream come true. I am restoring all sorts of things with this product. I recommend. The bathroom porcelain vanity had a rust stain. It was there when I moved in. It was not coming out with regular maintenance cleaning. This product restored the porcelain in seconds. No trace of the rust stain.
customer_reviews.author: Mulan

customer_reviews.title: Spot free shine that lasts
customer_reviews.text: I made the big mistake of choosing brushed nickel for my tub and shower fixtures. Every drop of water shows and really messes up the look of the metal. My daughter recommended this product and it is AWESOME. Just a small amount keeps the finish looking nice .. best used once a week.
customer_reviews.author: peter russo

customer_reviews.title: Good but not the same as the original version
customer_reviews.text: I love the old version. This new version works very well,but takes a little more work. So far the shine has lasted, and I love the ease of use, but don't understand the need to change the formula. I am using more to get the job done. Maybe they changed to sell more?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with this
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product. Easy to use. After years of smelly, toxic fumes I found this. Works quicky, shines like crazy, no fumes. Never looking anywhere else
customer_reviews.author: Sophie15

customer_reviews.title: Used MAAS for years
customer_reviews.text: Great product, Does a great job polishing metals. Have used it for years, and will continue to use it. easy, and dependable.
customer_reviews.author: MDC65

customer_reviews.title: Best metal polish.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff and a little elbow grease will make your metals gleam. I use it now and then on the brass doorknobs in my old house and it transforms them. You will have to polish again eventually, of course, but the results seem to last quite a while. It's the consistency of toothpaste, so it's much nicer to use than the runny polishes like Brasso. It reminds me of the German polish Simichrome, but it's lavender instead of pink.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as in the past
customer_reviews.text: Not As Good As It Use To Be. Still works OK, but does not seem to act as fast as years ago and takes more than one application on most metal items to get really clean
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great metal polish
customer_reviews.text: Replacing my low product supply . Best for polishing my drum Cymbals/vintage aluminum trailer parts. Great on all metals. Great luster when buffed. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: vulcan

customer_reviews.title: Good product for cleaning silverware
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to clean my silverplate silverware and it is great. Much better than the usual cleaners for silverware.
customer_reviews.author: H. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Metal Polish
customer_reviews.text: One of the best metal polishes I have ever used. You have to work a little but the results are stunning.
customer_reviews.author: IT Hack

customer_reviews.title: This was great for polishing my instrument and it was very easy ...
customer_reviews.text: This was great for polishing my instrument and it was very easy to apply. It didn't last as long as I hoped it would, and I had to reapply is every few days for my instrument to appear clean, but It was worth its money and I have to say I would probably buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: AshertopiA

customer_reviews.title: Worth paying a bit more.
customer_reviews.text: Best quality. Not too harsh on metals. And easy to use. I highly recommend for interior uses!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: No more of the other brand
customer_reviews.text: I thought Brasso was the only cleaner for brass. I was wrong! This gets an incredible shine with minimal effort
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great on Apple Watch Stainless Steel. I would highly recommend this product if you want to get rid of scratches
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great polish
customer_reviews.text: Awesome polish. Makes quick work. Do not use on bugle style beads on necklace. Tje silver plating is so thin it takes it down to the copper. Good to use on silver objects like serving tools or serving dishes. Be careful with jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great polish
customer_reviews.text: Great polish with bright results for my tarnished brass bed and lamps. Don't really know about longevity as I just recently used. I also have sealed it with two coats of the protective product mentioned by Mass. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: NSA

customer_reviews.title: The best silver polish ever!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite metal polish. I was glad to find this on amazon! Pricy but so effective! Nothing like it!
customer_reviews.author: Cathlyn White Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Miracle
customer_reviews.text: Miracle silver cleaner. I could not believe how quickly it removed years old tarnish from great grandmother's silver. Just one wipe and tarnish is gone. So much better than any cleaner I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmother of 5

customer_reviews.title: Best polish around
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this metal polish for years! It really is the best out there
customer_reviews.author: ann heintz

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job, and does it well
customer_reviews.text: No substitution.,,,, the original , and this is the best
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Bring a brilliant shine to every metal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific product! Takes very little to use to provide a brilliant shine get rid of stubborn tarnish.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J Harbert

customer_reviews.title: Works well on silver
customer_reviews.text: Ok, soooo... this product works well on silver but DO NOT use it on anything gold plated, it will remove the gold plating and make whatever you are polishing look more silver toned. It does remove scratches and polishes really well though.
customer_reviews.author: Meridith Knox

customer_reviews.title: Best polishing cream!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is expensive, but it's the best I have found. I just put a thin layer on silver and then wipe it off. Shines right up.
customer_reviews.author: CatmomMarcia

customer_reviews.title: Top quality Cream
customer_reviews.text: I have used this cream for over 20 years. I originally bought it in Germany. Works wonders on silver, gold, copper, you name it. If you want a safe, quality cream, use Maas Cream.
customer_reviews.author: L. Babinsack

customer_reviews.title: Cleans everything
customer_reviews.text: It cleans everything and I can’t smell the French lavender scent which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: Number one product.
customer_reviews.text: Great great great chrome polish. Shipped bike from Japan had ALOT of messed up chrome. This takes rubber off pipes and fixes most chrome issues. But now you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Keller

customer_reviews.title: ... it she’s been using it for decades it works great on metal definitely a great
customer_reviews.text: This is a product I bought for my mother and she swears by it she’s been using it for decades it works great on metal definitely a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Gioia

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend and buy again. Did a great job shining up my antiqued metals. I liked the consistency of it. Fast shipping and nice size.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Silver polish
customer_reviews.text: I've always used this product on my jewelry. It the best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Keiper

customer_reviews.title: Super duper polish
customer_reviews.text: Teriffic product that polishes almost every metal surface. Cleans and polished with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Eun

customer_reviews.title: Cap missing Therefore cannot use or two will dry out. Extremely inconvenient.
customer_reviews.text: I received the box of maas metal polish. Unfortunately there is no top it so once I remove the foil ceiling the tube it will dry out.... This should not happen And is a total inconvenience to me to have to return this in any of the options provided. The least they could do at this point is to send me a cap.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: The best all-metal polish ever.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Use a disposable rag to apply and polish. Does not irritate skin, but wear gloves to avoid scrubbing your hands clean afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: requires elbow grease
customer_reviews.text: More than a single application is required, therefore paste gets used quickly. VERY gentle on silver finish.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The best polish I have ever used. Worked on silver and copper and lasts longer than most that I have tried
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: Then I read the label and found that this polishing cream is good for many metals
customer_reviews.text: Not just for silver which I've used it for for years. Then I read the label and found that this polishing cream is good for many metals. It is! This is a superb product.
customer_reviews.author: rocketeer66

customer_reviews.title: The Best .
customer_reviews.text: I have tried damn near every metal polish over the years and hands down MAAS products work the best
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Of all the brass polisher's I've tried Maas is the best. Yes, you still have to rub, but not as much as other products. It makes polishing much quicker. My favorite technique is applying Maas with a Magic Eraser, then polishing with an old cotton tee shirt---gosh, it works well!
customer_reviews.author: Deus est

customer_reviews.title: Best metal polish on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful metal polish that I've been using for over 20 years. I found it in the 90s when I bought a set of antique table knives with carbon steel blades. Nothing would clean and polish them until I came across Maas in antique shop that specialized in silver. The dealer swore by it so I tried it and have used nothing else since for silver and other metals. It's well worth its price and a little goes a long way. I'm glad I've found a good source; it used to be in the supermarkets but has gotten very hard to fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Linder

customer_reviews.title: Best metal polish
customer_reviews.text: I have used MAAS metal polish for many years on my stainless steel kitchen sink and have always been amazed at how long the shine lasts. Each time I clean the sink the shine is as bright as if I had just polished it again. I only have to apply it twice a year. I tried it for the first time on a couple of pieces of my silver ware, too, and the shine on them was beautiful. It is a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: B. A. Holland

customer_reviews.title: great silver polish
customer_reviews.text: I hsve been using this polish for years and think it is the best...
customer_reviews.author: Martha B. Blake-adams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This polish is AMAZING. I had old Christmas bells that were so dingy - almost orange. And this worked like a charm. Seriously unbelievable. Old silver cleaner used to be such a pain.
customer_reviews.author: John Gogarty

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful for silver and brass. No rubbing required.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, works like a dream! Only need a small amount to get the job done
customer_reviews.author: Oxide

customer_reviews.title: very good polish
customer_reviews.text: it was the only polish to take out deep stains on my viking wine cellar door
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Straight razor rust
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to remove rust off my straight razor I haven't been using in a while. It worked very well but unfortunately there are still small spots on the razor I can't clean. I'll probably have to send it in to be professionally buffed/polished, but as far as this product is concerned I think it did a good job at removing most of the rust.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperMe

customer_reviews.title: Word as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well to polish a stainless steel bowl my son discolored by cooking. I used a hard foam buffing pads attached to my cordless drill and the paste renewed the old discolored bowl to a high shine
customer_reviews.author: Monica Eris

customer_reviews.title: Professional Grade Polish
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best for removing old tarnish. Brings back the original shine.
customer_reviews.author: mollymom

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL silver polish!
customer_reviews.text: This is GREAT for sterling silver! There is almost no odor, it is quick and easy to use! I hated polishing silver until I found this . . . now I look forward to it.
customer_reviews.author: DE

customer_reviews.title: DOES A GREAT JOB
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE USED THIS FOR YEARS. IT IS THE BEST.
customer_reviews.author: Lorain K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sewing machine metal maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Second tube. Beautiful finish on my metal pieces. I use this for cleaning sewing machine metal. I will keep buying it as it just works!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Apply lightly and it rubs right off leaving a beautiful shine. I have been using on bare aluminum
customer_reviews.author: rick r

customer_reviews.title: Better than most I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work better than n many polishes I've used. Experimented with aluminum and brass and got an acceptable shine without an overabundance of effort. Recommended for small items that don't have surface damage beyond moderate tarnish.
customer_reviews.author: Anon.

customer_reviews.title: Maas has one of the best Silver Polish products on the market
customer_reviews.text: Maas has one of the best Silver Polish products on the market. The price is very reasonable due to the fact that it only takes a bit to bring out the silver on your item and a smile on your face. I now enjoy polishing my little items.Even if the item is very dull, it may take two trys but it works!
customer_reviews.author: Dede's DVD's

customer_reviews.title: It is the worlds best for a reason
customer_reviews.text: Time and time again I buy this, there is no polish that cleans and protects like this,
customer_reviews.author: MirnaMinkoff

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Makes some pieces look like new. Some were tougher to clean.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: best metal polish there is--use it on everything from gold to raw brass
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on different metals and it cleans all of them well. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R.

customer_reviews.title: This is a product I have used
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have used it before and was thrilled I could get it again. It works very well and I use it for my silver and silver plate. It is gentle on the silver and works quickly. Thank you MAAS for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Penny G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Actually does remove rust from stainless steel. Used it on silverware, pots. Everything looks brand new with not a lot of work. I have at least 5 other product that did not work. This is worth the money. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: fme

customer_reviews.title: Great polish
customer_reviews.text: I have used this polish for years but haven't been able to find it in a store locally for quite sometime. This is great for polishing the scratches out of my jewelry (both gold and silver), brass items and silver. This tube is twice the size of the ones I had previously purchased and should last me for quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: BJC

customer_reviews.title: and she loved it, so I sent this to her
customer_reviews.text: I have used Maas Polish for years, and it never disappoints! I sent this tube to my daughter, who used it to polish some brass earrings on a recent visit with me, and she loved it, so I sent this to her.
customer_reviews.author: NoseInBook

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and works very fast
customer_reviews.text: this is an excellent product for all types of metal polishing. Plus the shine lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Frank De La Cerna

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It is important to me that it is easy to clean my silver serving pieces. Who wants to spend tons of time on that chore?? Maas makes it easy and quick!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Spannagel

customer_reviews.title: Maas polish is a discovery of a lifetime!
customer_reviews.text: The best metal polish I have found...over a period of 40 years! I polish the church's brass and silver. The shine lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Malpass

customer_reviews.title: Good polish
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good polish and I am very happy about my purchase. I wear a stainless steel wedding band and bracelet and it gives it a nice shine and a shine that lasts!!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Best of all brass products
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for years on brass auto parts. Nothing can compare.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: This was so easy to use and gave excellent results - I will ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible! This was so easy to use and gave excellent results - I will never use anything else ever again! I used to import Silvo from England, this is waaay better. And the scent is pleasant, not strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Product works well. Do not like it in a tube.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Can shine ANY metal !!!!
customer_reviews.text: My ex-husband “left” a tube of this when he left me. Both went VERY WELL. I remembered I had it when I was polishing the bathroom fixtures. It IS AMAZING. I looked locally, but couldn’t find it. Got it from Amazon. Thank You, Amazon! Can shine EVERYTHING in my home now.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Mass
customer_reviews.text: Great product, one of the by best on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best metal polish we've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best metal polish we've ever used, (including compared to Flitz, or Simichrome, etc)-- nothing better on copper, gold, or sterling. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shine
customer_reviews.text: This cream really polishes metal. I used it on my wedding band and got a great shine.
customer_reviews.author: longleaf pine

customer_reviews.title: I'd hoped it was like the German product we think was called Star Glanz ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is disappointing. It's as hard to use as any other metal polish. I'd hoped it was like the German product we think was called Star Glanz purchased while stationed in Germany. No comparison with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Graydon Howell

customer_reviews.title: The best metal cleaner yet.
customer_reviews.text: First bought this product at an antique show many years ago. Far superior to anything on the market. Very small amount is all you need. Brilliant shine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: removed hard to remove rust
customer_reviews.text: i used this polish to take off blemishes and minor rust spots off porcelian signs. A little went a long way and surprised me how well it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great metal polish that works on many surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Dweller

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Shiny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to brighten up my Oneida Sheraton stainless steel flatware and it has worked great. I rub a bit on while using a soft cloth to polish and when I am done the piece is shiny and the cloth is black. Minor scratch marks from he flatware bumping together in the drawer and dishwasher polish right off. My pattern is one that looks best with a bit of the tarnish left around the relief pattern, but it can be completely cleaned off the piece if that is the way you like your flatware.
customer_reviews.author: My Old KY Home

customer_reviews.title: Maas is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I do living history and reenact the Civil War. That requires a lot of metal polishing, ad Maas is simply the absolute best I have found! If you have polished brass at all you know the rubbing, the stinky polishes and repeat efforts to really shine it. Maas cuts the work down by at least 3/4. No strong odor, paste form with less mess, and does an amazing job!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this polish for years, with great results. I actually bought this tube for someone else, so that they could try it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Girl

customer_reviews.title: Best metal polish!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best metal polish!!!! Works as well as Semi Chrome but cheaper. SOOOOO much better than liquid polish. I polish a lot of jewelry and this stuff works great. Lasts a long time as a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great silver polish
customer_reviews.text: I've use this for years. Even though it says "Metal" polish it's a great silver polish. It really gets into the crevices of my ornate silver. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eleganza Baton Rouge, LA

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job with a bit of effort. Cleaned silver & brass items.
customer_reviews.author: puppetlady

customer_reviews.title: Great metal polish...
customer_reviews.text: I have been Maas metal polish user for years. It works as described and lasts quite a while. A little dab will do ya'.

product_meta.title: MAAS 91401 Metal Polish 4 Ounce, Pack of 1
product_meta.description: MAAS Metal Polish is a powerful wipe on wipe off formula that instantly removes years of residue, rust, tarnish and oxidation from all metals and more.
feature_bullets: MAAS Metal Polish is concentrated just a dab restores large areas
MAAS Metal Polish handles the toughest jobs yet gentle enough for delicate antiques
MAAS Metal Polish applies a super strong anti-tarnish corrosion inhibitor plus long-lasting protection
